18: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> יִקְשֶׁ֣ה <sup>7185 </sup> <n>It shall not seem hard</n> בְעֵינֶ֗ךָ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>unto thee</n> בְּשַׁלֵּֽחֲךָ֙ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>when thou sendest him away</n> אֹת֤וֹ <sup>853 </sup> חָפְשִׁי֙ <sup>2670 </sup> <n>free</n> מֵֽעִמָּ֔ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> כִּ֗י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מִשְׁנֶה֙ <sup>4932 </sup> <n>a double</n> שְׂכַ֣ר <sup>7939 </sup> <n>from thee for he hath been worth</n> שָׂכִ֔יר <sup>7916 </sup> <n>hired servant</n> עֲבָֽדְךָ֖ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>[to thee] in serving</n> שֵׁ֣שׁ <sup>8337 </sup> <n>thee six</n> שָׁנִ֑ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>years</n> וּבֵֽרַכְךָ֙ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>shall bless</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> בְּכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>you</n> תַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>thee in all that thou doest</n> פ
19: כָּֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַבְּכ֡וֹר <sup>1060 </sup> <n>All the firstling</n> אֲשֶׁר֩ <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> יִוָּלֵ֨ד <sup>3205 </sup> <n>that come</n> בִּבְקָרְךָ֤ <sup>1241 </sup> <n>of thy herd</n> וּבְצֹֽאנְךָ֙ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>and of thy flock</n> הַזָּכָ֔ר <sup>2145 </sup> <n>males</n> תַּקְדִּ֖ישׁ <sup>6942 </sup> <n>thou shalt sanctify</n> לַיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תַעֲבֹד֙ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>thou shalt do no work</n> בִּבְכֹ֣ר <sup>1060 </sup> <n>with the firstling</n> שׁוֹרֶ֔ךָ <sup>7794 </sup> <n>of thy bullock</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תָגֹ֖ז <sup>1494 </sup> <n>nor shear</n> בְּכ֥וֹר <sup>1060 </sup> <n>the firstling</n> צֹאנֶֽךָ׃ <sup>6629 </sup> <n>of thy sheep</n>
20: לִפְנֵי֩ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>[it] before</n> יְהוָ֨ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֤יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> תֹאכֲלֶ֙נּוּ֙ <sup>398 </sup> <n>Thou shalt eat</n> שָׁנָ֣ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>year</n> בְשָׁנָ֔ה <sup>8141 </sup> <n>by year</n> בַּמָּק֖וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>in the place</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> יִבְחַ֣ר <sup>977 </sup> <n>shall choose</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>which the LORD</n> אַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> וּבֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>thou and thy household</n>
21: וְכִֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>if</n> יִהְיֶ֨ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>has</n> ב֜וֹ מ֗וּם <sup>3971 </sup> <n>And if there be [any] blemish</n> פִּסֵּ֙חַ֙ <sup>6455 </sup> <n>therein [as if it be] lame</n> א֣וֹ <sup>176 </sup> <n>or</n> עִוֵּ֔ר <sup>5787 </sup> <n>or blind</n> כֹּ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> מ֣וּם <sup>3971 </sup> <n>blemish</n> רָ֑ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>[or have] any ill</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תִזְבָּחֶ֔נּוּ <sup>2076 </sup> <n>thou shalt not sacrifice</n> לַיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>it unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n>
22: בִּשְׁעָרֶ֖יךָ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>it within thy gates</n> תֹּאכֲלֶ֑נּוּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>Thou shalt eat</n> הַטָּמֵ֤א <sup>2931 </sup> <n>the unclean</n> וְהַטָּהוֹר֙ <sup>2889 </sup> <n>and the clean</n> יַחְדָּ֔ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>[person shall eat it] alike</n> כַּצְּבִ֖י <sup>6643 </sup> <n>as the roebuck</n> וְכָאַיָּֽל׃ <sup>354 </sup> <n>and as the hart</n>
23: רַ֥ק <sup>7535 </sup> <n>but</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> דָּמ֖וֹ <sup>1818 </sup> <n>the blood</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תֹאכֵ֑ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>Only thou shalt not eat</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הָאָ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>it upon the ground</n> תִּשְׁפְּכֶ֖נּוּ <sup>8210 </sup> <n>thereof thou shalt pour</n> כַּמָּֽיִם׃ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>as water</n> פ
